column4: how do i fix this google-chrome/unity/nvidia driver bug?: http://imgur.com/vu5am
Does this always happen? On what pages? Which driver do you use, which Ubuntu version are you on?
happen frequently when i open a new page in google chrome, nvidia 290.10, ubuntu 11.10
Hm I see... Have you tried alternative new tab pages? Some of them are actually awesome. Might help. If you need the standard one, well, I'd go and ask in #chromium-support
what u mean alternative new tab pages?
Oh, then it happens on any page?
but i can't really reproduce it at will
I see... Meh, then I suggest going to #chromium-support, doesn't really sound like an Ubuntu issue unless... you say it only happens in Unity?
usually happens when a page causes another tab to open
yea never happened to be before in previous ubuntu versions
I see, could you install some other lightweight DE and try there? I don't see the real need to keep using Unity
mmmok, does it work in unity2d?
Either way, do "ubuntu-bug unity" and report it. Nothing we can really do to help
